TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ColumnProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 为列提供程序提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for column providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列提供程序必须扩展此类。Column providers must extend this class. 类和 ADO.NET 实体框架类是扩展此类的提供程序。The class and the ADO.NET Entity Framework class are providers that extend this class.

span.span: The column provider.
The attribute collection.
Adds default attributes.
The attribute collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `attributes` 参数不包含 集合，但模型提供程序需要此属性，则添加 对象。If the `attributes` parameter does not contain the collection, but the model provider requires this attribute, the object is added. 如果 `attributes` 参数不包含 集合，而此提供程序表示的列是字符串，则添加 对象。If the `attributes` parameter does not contain the collection and the column that is represented by this provider is a string, the object is added.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否为模型的数据上下文之外的其他属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context.

value.span: 如果列是模型的数据上下文之外的其他属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不在数据上下文中的列通常来自视图或计算属性。Columns that are not in the data context typically come from a view or calculated property. 属性的值可用于确定是否支持排序等列操作。The value of the property can be used to determine whether column operations such as sorting are supported. 例如，由于数据库中不存在列，因此，数据模型的 接口的实现将不支持对返回 属性的 `true` 的属性进行排序。For example, the implementation of the interface of the data model will not support sorting on properties that return `true` for the property, because the column does not exist in the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于作为表实体（数据模型中的表对象）成员的强类型实体引用列，不设置此属性。This property is not set for strongly typed entity reference columns that are members of the table entity (a table object in the data model).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定列是否接受由数据访问接口定义的 null 值。This property specifies whether the column accepts null values as defined by the data provider. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values)。For more information, see [Handling Null Values](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values).
